n/a

Returns

the rendered template "token.html"

Liquidity Tracker tokens¶

tokens.create(token)[source]¶

Creates a new token in the tokens structure based on the passed in token data

Parameters

token -- token to create in tokens structure

Returns

201 on success, 406 on token exists

tokens.delete(token_id)[source]¶

Deletes a token from the tokens structure

Parameters

token_id -- Id of the token to delete

Returns

200 on successful delete, 404 if not found

tokens.read_all()[source]¶

Responds to a request for /api/tokens with the complete lists of tokens

Param

n/a

Returns

json string of list of tokens

tokens.read_one(token_id)[source]¶

Responds to a request for /api/tokens/{token_id} with one matching token from tokens

Parameters

token_id -- Id of token to find

Returns

token matching id

tokens.update(token_id, token)[source]¶

Updates an existing token in the tokens structure

Parameters

  • token_id -- Id of the token to update in the tokens structure

  • token -- token to update

Returns

updated token structure
